creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban 色道取組十二番)
text: The second sheet shows a shamisen instructor taking advantage of his young student. He holds her left hand against her chest and pushes her right arm to the ground as he uses his weight to pin her down, her right wrist is twisted in resistance.
title: Shamisen Instructor, No. 2 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
